years,

years, average lifespan until failure measured on a supercomputer in Ostrouchov, G.; Maxwell, D.; Ashraf, R. A.; Engelmann, C.; Shankar, M.; and Rogers, J. H. 2020. GPU Lifetimes on Titan Supercomputer: Survival Analysis and Reliability. In SC20: International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking, Storage and  Analysis, 1–14.

years, reference lifespan used for a personal laptop in the ADEME's database for digital footprint (v 2.0) https://base-empreinte.ademe.fr/documentation/base-impact (last access on 19th may 2025) after creating an account on the ADEME website, going to section "4 - AI - Base Impacts®- Documentation" and by clicking on the file "Numérique".
